title: Falazure
text: Falazure, the Night Dragon, the Reaver, is the [[Dragon God|Dragon Gods]] of Decay, Undeath, and Exhaustion. Just as exhaustion is followed by sleep, followed by waking renewed, adherents of Falazure revere death as a joyous releasing of the burdens of the flesh. Many take the analogy further, and consider [[undeath|undead]] to be akin to awaking from a refreshing sleep. "When sleep comes, let me wake from the sleep. When death comes, let me wake in undeath."
